00041 #ifndef _xmlbase_cpp
00042 #define _xmlbase_cpp
00043 
00044 #define TIXML_USE_TICPP
00045 #include <ticpp.h>
00046 
00047 #include "xmlbase.h"
00048 
00049 namespace phys
00050 {
00051     namespace xml
00052     {
00053         Base::~Base()
00054         {
00055             //If we have ownership then delete the data
00056             if (this == this->Wrapped->GetBasePointer()->GetUserData());
00057             {
00058                 delete this->Wrapped;
00059             }
00060         }
00061 
00062         void Base::TakeOwnerOfWrapped()
00063             { this->Wrapped->GetBasePointer()->SetUserData(this); }
00064 
00065         void Base::DropOwnerShipOfWrapped(void* WhoIsResponsible)
00066             { this->Wrapped->GetBasePointer()->SetUserData(WhoIsResponsible); }
00067 
00068         int Base::Row () const
00069             { return this->Wrapped->Row();}
00070 
00071         int Base::Column () const
00072             { return this->Wrapped->Column(); }
00073 
00074         bool Base::operator== (const Base &OtherBase) const
00075             { return ( this->Wrapped == OtherBase.Wrapped ); }
00076 
00077         bool Base::operator!= (const Base &OtherBase) const
00078             { return ( this->Wrapped != OtherBase.Wrapped ); }
00079 
00080         String Base::BuildDetailedErrorString() const
00081             { return this->Wrapped->BuildDetailedErrorString(); }
00082 
00083         String Base::GetTypeAsString() const
00084             { return GetTypeAsString (this->GetType()); }
00085 
00086         String Base::GetTypeAsString(XMLComponentType NodeType)
00087         {
00088             switch (NodeType)
00089             {
00090                 case Base::isAttribute:
00091                     return String("Attribute");
00092                 case Base::isComment:
00093                     return String("Comment");
00094                 case Base::isDeclaration:
00095                     return String("Declaration");
00096                 case Base::isDocument:
00097                     return String("Document");
00098                 case Base::isElement:
00099                     return String("Element");
00100                 case Base::isStylesheetReference:
00101                     return String("StylesheetReference");
00102                 case Base::isText:
00103                     return String("isText");
00104                 case Base::isUnknown:
00105                     return String("Unknown");
00106                 default:
00107                     return String("Very Unknown");
00108             }
00109         }
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113     }// /xml
00114 }// /phys

00116 
00117 #endif
